gameCategories.name: 4 couples
gameCategories.subtitle: Strengthen your bond with intimate and revealing questions designed to bring you and your partner closer.

gameOverMessage.message:
Each player writes a heartfelt message to the other, expressing their hopes and dreams for the future. 
Exchange and read them aloud, then keep them as a reminder of your bond.
Discuss your biggest dreams and aspirations for your relationship. Make a plan to achieve them together.
Write a heartfelt letter to each other reflecting on your journey together. Exchange and read aloud.

Create a time capsule together with items that represent your relationship. 
Decide when to open it in the future.
Plan a significant future milestone celebration. Discuss the details and make it a goal.

Share your most cherished memories from your relationship. 
Reflect on how far you’ve come together.
Write a love letter to each other to be read in ten years. Exchange and seal.

gameCategories.name: BFFs
gameCategories.subtitle: Celebrate your unique friendship with fun and thought-provoking questions. Whether you're lifelong pals or new friends, this game helps you learn even more about each other.

gameOverMessage.message:
Each write a heartfelt letter to the other expressing your appreciation and share them. 
Open when not together anymore.
Take turns sharing something you’ve always wanted to tell the other but haven’t.
Each person shares their favorite quality about the other and why it’s important to them.
Describe your favorite memory together and why it stands out. Compare and discuss.
Share what you value most in your friendship and why.
Reflect on the game: what’s one thing you learned about your friend that you didn’t know before?
List three things you’ve learned from each other and how they’ve impacted your life.
Describe how your friendship has grown since you first met.
Write down one goal you want to achieve together in the next year. Share and make a plan.
Share one way you think your friendship will evolve in the future.

gameCategories.name: Inside family
gameCategories.subtitle: Bring your family closer with questions that spark laughter, nostalgia, and heartfelt discussions.

gameOverMessage.message:
“Take a moment to reflect on your favorite memory from today’s game. (Everyone)
 Share it with the group and explain why it stands out to you.”

Create a time capsule with small notes or items representing each family member’s current 
dreams or achievements. Decide on a date to open it in the future.”

Take a family photo together to capture the moment. 
Discuss what you’d like to remember about this day and the game.”

“Create a vision board as a family. Discuss and list out one big goal or dream each of you has for the 
family’s future. You can draw, write, or make a collage.”

“Discuss and decide on a new tradition or activity that you would like to start as a family. 
Share why it’s meaningful to you.”

“Each person writes a letter to their future self, describing their current life and what they hope for the future. 
Seal the letters and set a date to open them together.”

“Each person expresses one thing they are grateful for about another family member. 
Make sure to specify why it matters to you.”

“Write a short letter to each family member, sharing what you admire about them or a 
special memory you have with them. Exchange the letters.”

“Each person performs a short talent or shares a special skill they have. 
Celebrate and appreciate each other’s unique abilities.”

“Write down a favorite family memory or something you’ve learned about another family member 
today. Put it in a jar to revisit during future family gatherings.”

“Agree on a fun family challenge or goal to achieve together within the next month. 
It could be a fitness challenge, a creative project, or a learning goal.”
